name: Cheatbusters
description:
One day a detective agency was visited by a young woman who wanted to discover the truth of her beloved man, a lowly bank clerk. She put him under suspicion after finding his bill of purchasing of an expensive jewelry about that she knew nothing.

Steve, a talent detective, must solve this strange case. And the deeper he inquired into the matter the more he suspected the young man. A note written by a mysterious woman, a sudden death of a near relative, who left a large fortune to the clerk, a colt revolver in his cabinet and a leased yacht â€“the case becomes more complicated and interesting.
